#summary dbstream - streams data to or from a database.

= Usage =

`dbstream <options> `

if --dsn, --uid, or --pwd aren't specified, environment variables DB_DSN, DB_UID, and DB_PWD will be used for the unprovided values.

= Options =
||*Short Opt*||*Long Opt*||*Argument*||*Description*||
||-h||--help|| ||print this message and exit||
|| ||--delimiter||<delim> ||field separator string (default: 0xfe)||
||-f||--file||<sql_file> ||run sql specified in this file||
||-s||--sql||<sql> ||run sql specified here||
||-i||--input||<input_file> ||file containing placeholder values for insert/update statements||
||-o||--output||<output_file> ||write to specified file instead of stdout||
|| ||--dsn||<dsn> ||DBI-style data source name||
|| ||--uid||<uid> ||database username||
|| ||--pwd||<pwd> ||database password||

----
